game.title: The Stolen Amulet
game.objective: The Elder has stolen the amulet of the Blacksmith. You must retrieve it and return it to the Elder.
game.description: The Blacksmith has stolen the amulet of the Elder. You must retrieve it and return it to the Elder.

task.description: The Blacksmith can be found in his shop in the market.
The amulet is hidden in a secret compartment in the Blacksmith's safe.

task.objective: Return the amulet to the Elder
task.description: The Elder can be found in his hut outside of town.
